attachments.displayName:
Nature Photography - Sunlit by John Seba

Buy this print on Art.com:  http://go.art.com/EEHdcSB

From serene to turbulent, the ocean has many moods, changing with the light and weather. John Seba has captured the open ocean, the horizon, and the sky in many different variations, including today’s featured “Sunlit” expanse of sea and sky.

A native of Argentina, Seba was originally drawn to black and white photography and studied the works of Ansel Adams before exploring the possibilities of shooting in color. Now living and working in southern California, color filled ocean views are a favorite subject, and he has added mixed media to his artistic creations, combining his photography with hand painted elements. Discover more of John Seba’s artistic vision in our gallery of his work at http://www.art.com/gallery/id--a61862/john-seba-posters.htm?rfid=978544
